pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Django Auth MixinsBackport of Django 1.9 [authmixins](https://github.com/django/django/blob/1.9.4/django/contrib/auth/mixins.py)for Django 1.8.x LTS:* LoginRequiredMixin* PermissionRequiredMixin* UserPassesTestMixin## Usage from auth_mixins import LoginRequiredMixin, PermissionRequiredMixin, UserPassesTestMixin## Docs- https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/1.9/topics/auth/default/#the-loginrequired-mixin- https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/1.9/topics/auth/default/#the-permissionrequiredmixin-mixin- https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/1.9/topics/auth/default/#django.contrib.auth.mixins.UserPassesTestMixin## LicenseLike Django, see `LICENSE` file.
